briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Lanadelumab (SHP643) in Japanese Participants With Hereditary Angioedema (HAE)
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Multi-center, Open-label Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Lanadelumab (SHP643) in Japanese Subjects With Hereditary Angioedema
summary: The purpose of this phase 3, open-label, multi-center study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of lanadelumab in Japanese participants with HAE Type I or II.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants Achieving Attack-Free Status for the Efficacy Evaluation Period of Day 0 Through Day 182
